overview:
Peperoni Mobile & Internet Software GmbH is a Wireless Application Service Provider focused on User Generated Content and Mobile Social Networking. They have pioneered this sector in 2001 and since then operate mobile Web 2.0 solutions on behalf of operators like T-Mobile and on their own. Their off-deck brand peperonity.com attracts more than 10 million monthly visitors worldwide. All users and visitors generate more than 500 million page impressions every month.

Peperoni is a full service provider with expertise both in on-portal as well as in off-portal applications and provide one of the worldâ€™s largest network of mobile sites and profiles. Mobile network operators have detected the opportunity to increase data ARPU and MMS revenues by launching white-label solutions. Brands raise their profile and mobile application manufacturers will drive traffic to their site by advertising into Peperoniâ€™s large user base.

At Peperonity.com users can easily create their own mobile web site, fill and decorate it. They can download any imaginable stuff and make friends all over the world to chat and stay in contact with them.

Peperoni is a global player in this business and its peperonity.com is translated in 10 languages. The available languages are German, English, French, Grecian, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Romanian, Russian and Spanish .

The community is supervised by a computer system. Secondary expert moderators work all over the world and in house for answering questions in the userâ€™s language and care for security and observation of the terms and conditions in the community.

Peperoni offers all currently available document types, from WML across HTML up to xHTML.
